i = 0,
l = $$$nativeWindowKeys.length;

$$$nativeWindowKeysCheckMap[$$$nativeWindowKeys[i]] = 1;
}
window.__globalErrorEvents = [];
function errorEventHandler(e) {
window.__globalErrorEvents.push(e);
}
function addEvent(el, ev, fn) {
if (el) {
if (el.addEventListener) {
el.addEventListener(ev, fn);
} else if (el.attachEvent) {
el.attachEvent(ev, fn);
}
}
}
addEvent(window, 'error', errorEventHandler);
delete window.addEvent;
</script>

0.5; -moz-opacity: 0.5; opacity: 0.5; } .ux-message_icon { font-size: 14px; margin-right: 5px; vertical-align: middle; } .ux-message-info { background: #00c0ef; color: white; border: 1px solid transparent; } .ux-message-success { background: #00a65a; color: white; border: 1px solid transparent; } .ux-message-warning { background: #ff513a; color: white; border: 1px solid transparent; } class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188"><span class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188_span189">理学</span></div></a></div></div><div class="cateNavR-container-f"><div cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div187"></div><div class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188"><span class="f-thide target="_blank" class="cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186"><div class="u-icon-philosophy cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div187"></div><div class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188"><span class="f-thide cateNavR-container-f_div185_a186_div188_span189">哲学</span></div></a></div></div><div class="cateNavR-container-f"><div class="f-fl cateNavR-container-f_div185"><a href="/category/law" <div class="f-cb">
<a hidefocus="true" target="_blank" class="schoolImg f-fl" title="北京理工大学" href="/university/BIT">
<img class="" id="" src="https://nos.netease.com/edu-image/C3257A57EE18C9695E8CEEFC957F373E.png?imageView&amp;thumbnail=220y80&amp;quality=100" width="108" height="40" alt="北京理工大学">
</a>
<div class="f-fl info">
<div class="f-cb">
<a hidefocus="true" class="f-fl" target="_blank" href="/course/BIT-1001870001?tid=1002236011">
<h4 class="f-fc3 courseTxt">Python网络爬虫与信息提取</h4>
</a>

<a class="u-cert u-cert2 f-fc6 f-fl" target="_blank" href="/cert/apply.htm?termId=1002236011"><span class="f-icon u-icon-cert"></span>申请认证证书</a>
</div>
<h5 class="f-fc6 padding-top-5">
<a class="f-fcgreen" href="/u/1732151471" target="_blank">嵩天</a>
</h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="g-mn1">
<div class="g-mn1c m-learnbox" id="courseLearn-inner-box">
<div><div class="m-learnChapterList f-pr"><div class="j-moduletitle u-learn-moduletitle f-cb" style=""><h2 class="f-fl j-moduleName">课件<br></h2><p class="u-helplink f-fc9 f-fr"><a class="f-fcgreen" href="/help/help.htm#/hf?t=2" target="_blank">查看帮助</a></p></div><div class="empty j-empty" style="display: none;"><span class="f-ib">老师还没有发布任何学习内容，请耐心等待</span></div><div class="m-learnChapterNormal f-pr"><div class="titleBox j-titleBox f-cb" id="auto-id-1526905636940"><div class="f-icon cpicon j-down f-fl u-icon-caret-up" style=""></div><div class="f-icon cpicon j-up f-fl u-icon-caret-down" style="display: none;"></div><div class="cpicon j-noContent f-fl" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div><h3 class="j-titleName name f-fl f-thide">【第〇周】网络爬虫之前奏</h3></div><div class="f-pa line j-line"></div><div class="lessonBox j-lessoBox"><div class="u-learnLesson normal f-cb f-pr" id="auto-id-1526905636943"><div class="j-icon icon f-pa icon-1"></div><h4 class="j-name name f-fl f-thide">“网络爬虫”课程内容导学</h4><div class="j-typebox f-cb f-fr"><div><div class="f-icon lsicon f-fl " data-cid="1003503351" title="视频：全课程内容导学" id="auto-id-1526905636944"><span class="u-icon-video2"></span></div><div class="f-icon lsicon f-fl " data-cid="1003503352" title="文档：全课程内容导学（WS00单元）学习资料" id="auto-id-1526905636946"><span class="u-icon-doc"></span></div></div></div></div><div class="u-learnLesson normal f-cb f-pr last" id="auto-id-1526905636950"><div class="j-icon icon f-pa icon-1"></div><h4 class="j-name name f-fl f-thide">Python语言开发工具选择</h4><div class="j-typebox f-cb f-fr"><div class="f-icon lsicon f-fl " data-cid="1003503353" title="视频：Python语言开发工具选择"><span class="u-icon-video2" id="auto-id-1526905636951"></span></div></div></div></div><div class="j-previewStatus"></div></div><div class="m-learnChapterNormal f-pr"><div class="titleBox j-titleBox f-cb" id="auto-id-1526905636955"><div class="f-icon cpicon j-down f-fl u-icon-caret-up" style="display: none;"></div><div class="f-icon cpicon j-up f-fl u-icon-caret-down" style=""></div><div class="cpicon j-noContent f-fl" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div><h3 class="j-titleName name f-fl f-thide">【第一周】网络爬虫之规则</h3></div><div class="f-pa line j-line"></div><div class="lessonBox j-lessoBox"></div><div class="j-previewStatus"></div></div><div class="m-learnChapterNormal f-pr"><div class="titleBox j-titleBox f-cb" id="auto-id-1526905636958"><div class="f-icon cpicon j-down f-fl u-icon-caret-up" style="display: none;"></div><div class="f-icon cpicon j-up f-fl u-icon-caret-down" style=""></div><div class="cpicon j-noContent f-fl" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div><h3 class="j-titleName name f-fl f-thide">【第二周】网络爬虫之提取</h3></div><div class="f-pa line j-line"></div><div class="lessonBox j-lessoBox"></div><div class="j-previewStatus"></div></div><div class="m-learnChapterNormal f-pr"><div class="titleBox j-titleBox f-cb" id="auto-id-1526905636961"><div class="f-icon cpicon j-down f-fl u-icon-caret-up" style="display: none;"></div><div class="f-icon cpicon j-up f-fl u-icon-caret-down" style=""></div><div class="cpicon j-noContent f-fl" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div><h3 class="j-titleName name f-fl f-thide">【第三周】网络爬虫之实战</h3></div><div class="f-pa line j-line"></div><div class="lessonBox j-lessoBox"></div><div class="j-previewStatus"></div></div><div class="m-learnChapterNormal f-pr"><div class="titleBox j-titleBox f-cb" id="auto-id-1526905636964"><div class="f-icon cpicon j-down f-fl u-icon-caret-up" style="display: none;"></div><div class="f-icon cpicon j-up f-fl u-icon-caret-down" style=""></div><div class="cpicon j-noContent f-fl" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div><h3 class="j-titleName name f-fl f-thide">【第四周】*网络爬虫之框架（选修）</h3></div><div class="f-pa line j-line"></div><div class="lessonBox j-lessoBox"></div><div class="j-previewStatus"></div></div><div class="m-learnChapterNormal f-pr"><div class="titleBox j-titleBox f-cb" id="auto-id-1526905636967"><div class="f-icon cpicon j-down f-fl u-icon-caret-up" style="display: none;"></div><div class="f-icon cpicon j-up f-fl u-icon-caret-down" style=""></div><div class="cpicon j-noContent f-fl" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div><h3 class="j-titleName name f-fl f-thide">【第四周+】网络爬虫之未完待续</h3></div><div class="f-pa line j-line"></div><div class="lessonBox j-lessoBox"></div><div class="j-previewStatus"></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
